option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from field import ExtensionField from vole import Vole from prover import Prover from verifier import Verifier from circuit import Gate, Wire
# Setup field = ExtensionField(8) vole = Vole(field, 1000) prover = Prover(vole) verifier = Verifier(vole)
print("Testing gate evaluation with corrections") print("=" * 50)
# Test 1: Addition gate val1, val2 = 3, 5 idx1, d1 = prover.commit(val1) verifier.update_q(idx1, d1) idx2, d2 = prover.commit(val2) verifier.update_q(idx2, d2)
wire1 = Wire(val1, idx1) wire2 = Wire(val2, idx2)
gate = Gate('add', [wire1, wire2], prover, verifier) result = gate.evaluate() expected = field.add(val1, val2) print(f'\n1. Addition: {val1} + {val2} = {result} (expected {expected})') print(f' Values match: {result == expected}')
# Test 2: Multiplication gate val3, val4 = 7, 9 idx3, d3 = prover.commit(val3) verifier.update_q(idx3, d3) idx4, d4 = prover.commit(val4) verifier.update_q(idx4, d4)
wire3 = Wire(val3, idx3) wire4 = Wire(val4, idx4)
gate = Gate('mul', [wire3, wire4], prover, verifier) result = gate.evaluate() expected = field.mul(val3, val4) print(f'\n2. Multiplication: {val3} * {val4} = {result} (expected {expected})') print(f' Values match: {result == expected}')
# Test 3: Square gate val5 = 4 idx5, d5 = prover.commit(val5) verifier.update_q(idx5, d5) wire5 = Wire(val5, idx5)
gate = Gate('square', [wire5], prover, verifier) result = gate.evaluate() expected = field.mul(val5, val5) print(f'\n3. Square: {val5}^2 = {result} (expected {expected})') print(f' Values match: {result == expected}')
# Test 4: Cube gate val6 = 3 idx6, d6 = prover.commit(val6) verifier.update_q(idx6, d6) wire6 = Wire(val6, idx6)
gate = Gate('cube', [wire6], prover, verifier) result = gate.evaluate() expected = field.mul(field.mul(val6, val6), val6) print(f'\n4. Cube: {val6}^3 = {result} (expected {expected})') print(f' Values match: {result == expected}')
print("\n" + "=" * 50) print("All tests passed! âœ“")

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from field import ExtensionField
field = ExtensionField(8)
# Valid Sudoku row (1-9) valid_row = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9] sum_of_squares = 0 for val in valid_row: square = field.mul(val, val) sum_of_squares = field.add(sum_of_squares, square) print(f"Sum of squares for valid row [1-9]: {sum_of_squares}")
# Different permutation (still valid) valid_row2 = [9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1] sum_of_squares2 = 0 for val in valid_row2: square = field.mul(val, val) sum_of_squares2 = field.add(sum_of_squares2, square) print(f"Sum of squares for valid row [9-1]: {sum_of_squares2}")
# Invalid row (has duplicate) invalid_row = [1, 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9] sum_of_squares3 = 0 for val in invalid_row: square = field.mul(val, val) sum_of_squares3 = field.add(sum_of_squares3, square) print(f"Sum of squares for invalid row: {sum_of_squares3}")
